scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: cross-env DISABLE_NEW_JSX_TRANSFORM=true SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true DISABLE_NEW_ASSET_COPY=true BROWSER=none DISABLE_ESLINT=true TRANSPILE_DEPS=false USE_FAST_SASS=true react-scripts build
scripts.start:frontend: cross-env DISABLE_NEW_JSX_TRANSFORM=true SKIP_PREFLIGHT_CHECK=true DISABLE_NEW_ASSET_COPY=true BROWSER=none DISABLE_ESLINT=true TRANSPILE_DEPS=false USE_FAST_SASS=true react-scripts start
